project2adv

Interface AccountInfo

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Account, Checking, Credit, Saving

    public interface AccountInfo
    The AccountInfo interface defines methods for retrieving basic account information. This interface can be implemented by various account types to provide a standardized way of displaying account details, checking the current balance, and identifying the account type.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayAccountInfo()
      Displays information about the account.
      java.lang.String getAccountType()
      Retrieves the type of the account.
      double showBalance()
      Retrieves the current balance of the account.

    • Method Detail

      • displayAccountInfo

        void displayAccountInfo()
        Displays information about the account. This may include details such as the account number, current balance, and other relevant account-specific information.

      • showBalance

        double showBalance()
        Retrieves the current balance of the account.
        Returns:
        the current balance of the account

      • getAccountType

        java.lang.String getAccountType()
        Retrieves the type of the account. Implementations should specify the type, such as "Checking" or "Saving", as appropriate.
        Returns:
        a String representing the account type
